
############################## Experiment details ##############################

dataset: speech_commands
dataset_dir: ../datasets/speech_commands/
output_dir: output/debug/signavg-speech_commands-2022-07-10_22:36:57/
model: m5
num_rounds: 100
eval_every: 10
ServerType: <class 'rayleaf.entities.server.Server'>
client_types: [(<class 'rayleaf.entities.client.Client'>, 100)]
clients_per_round: 10
client_lr: 0.05
batch_size: 64
seed: 0
use_val_set: False
num_epochs: 5
gpus_per_client_cluster: 0.75
num_client_clusters: 8
save_model: False

############################## Simulation ##############################

Spawning 8 ClientClusters using cuda device (this may take a while)
100 total clients: 100 Clients
